name: Search For Treasure
description:
Title: Search For Treasure
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview:
Collect all the crystals and find the treasure chest in this LEGO microgame. Avoid obstacles and enemies and make it to the highest point.
Instructions:
WASD to move, SPACE to jump and double jump. TAB to pause.

Game Design Team
Shawn Dean – Game Designer
